Text:
I read that you are going to start uploading Ingraham....  G R E A T !!!

Thanks in advance

I think it was actually freedomczar that said he was going to post Laura Ingraham podcasts.  He used to post them, but stopped.  It would also be nice if someone posted Sean Hannity podcasts on a daily basis.  Hannity is actually #2 rated radio show, with Rush at #1 and Glenn at #3
All, check out Nicodemus75's posts of the official podcast of GB including the 4th hour.  I'll be taking a breather while he's uploading.  If he stops or anything, I'll pick back up.
Miss the rips! Please don't stay away too long!!

wroughtup, click on Nicodemus75's name or this link:

http://thepiratebay.org/user/Nicodemus75/

to see his uploads of the official podcast of all 3 hours plus the 4th hour as well.  I have suspended capturing and editing the raw webcast for now while we have an official uploader.
any chance you could start uploading these again? Nicodemus75 seems to have stopped. Thanks in advance.
